narrative.narrative: Malindo Air is a joint venture between the National Aerospace and Defence Industries of Malaysia and Lion Air of Indonesia. Malindo the name is a combination of Malaysia and Indonesia. They began operation in 2013. Its base is Kuala Lumpur, at both its airports. They already have 11 domestic destinations and 7 in Indonesia, 4 in India, 2 in Thailand, 2 in Bangladesh and Singapore. Late 2015 has 2 in Pakistan starting. They have six 737-900ERS with 19 on order and 10 ATR 72-600s with 5 on order. They plan to have 100 planes ten years from 2014.
